ModMetaData.name: BigFluffies
ModMetaData.author: Rihlsul
ModMetaData.description: This mod makes big fluffy pink creatures. This mutant is easily spotted since it is huge and bright pink, possible arising from some strange things involving a hare, rum, and a Megasloth. The extra fluff makes them sturdy in the cold and the duller under-fluff can be sheared. They're strangely bright and can be trained. Recent experimentation revealed their thick wool supports holding items and they don't appear to mind or even notice, making them useful as pack animals.
